doc.after: The national sport disputed discuss of Mauritius is football 77 and the national team is the Club M other popular sports in Mauritius include cycling table tennis badminton volleyball basketball handball boxing judo karate taekwondo weightlifting bodybuilding and athletics Water sports includes swimming sailing scuba diving and water skiing
